metadata.title: How to Write YouTube Descriptions 2025: SEO-Optimized Guide
metadata.description: Write YouTube descriptions that rank. SEO tips and templates for better visibility.

hero.headline: How to Write YouTube Descriptions
hero.subheadline: Optimize for search. Get discovered by the right viewers.

sections.content: Your description is prime SEO real estate—5,000 characters to help YouTube understand and rank your content. Most creators waste it. A well-written description improves search rankings, increases watch time through proper context, and drives traffic to your other content. Here's how to write descriptions that work.

sections.title: Description Structure
content: First 150 characters: Hook + keyword (shows in search)
Paragraph 2: Expand on video value, more keywords
Social links: Keep consistent across videos
Default text: Channel info, posting schedule

content.title: Primary Keyword
content.description: Include target keyword in first sentence.

content.title: Natural Language
content.description: Write for humans first, include variations.

content.title: Hashtags
content.description: 3-5 relevant hashtags. First 3 appear above title.

content.title: Internal Links
content.description: Link to related videos and playlists.

content.title: Timestamps
content.description: Chapter markers improve navigation and SEO.

content.title: Resources
content.description: Links to tools, downloads, references mentioned.

faq.question: How long should descriptions be?
faq.answer: Use available space—longer descriptions rank better. Minimum 200 words recommended. Front-load important info since only first 150 characters show in search. Don't pad with fluff.

faq.question: Do descriptions affect rankings?
faq.answer: Yes—YouTube uses descriptions to understand content and context. Keywords in descriptions help search ranking. Well-structured descriptions also improve click-through from search results.

faq.question: What are timestamps/chapters?
faq.answer: Format: 0:00 Introduction. Creates clickable chapters in video player. Improves user experience and SEO. YouTube may show in search results. Start at 0:00, minimum 3 timestamps, 10+ seconds each.

faq.question: How many hashtags should I use?
faq.answer: 3-5 hashtags optimal. First 3 appear above video title clickable. Too many looks spammy. Use specific, relevant tags. Mix broad and niche hashtags.
